data.text:
Outstanding breakfast, very romantic and super tasty dinner at the beach front, very dedicated kitchen team that brings Turkish kitchen to an extraordinary fine dining level. 

Only drawback was the fitnessstudio: not properly cleaned, no towels and water.
data.title: Unforgettable vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 578joachimp,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your recent stay at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the outstanding breakfast and romantic dinner at our beachfront restaurant. Our team takes great pride in delivering exceptional Turkish cuisine to our guests.

We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered at our fitness studio. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we have taken immediate steps to rectify these issues. We are committed to maintaining a clean and well-equipped fitness facility with towels and water readily available for our guests.

We appreciate your constructive criticism, as it helps us improve and continue delivering exceptional experiences to our valued guests. We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again in the future and exceeding your expectations in every aspect of your stay.

Thank you for choosing our hotel, and please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any further comments or suggestions.

Warm regards,
Hotel Manager 
Hasan Uzunhasan
owner_response.author: Eray Yönden

data.text: Amazing experience dinner in a wonderful place . Food top quality freshly cocked by amazing chef ADNAN . All the teams in the hotel are looking for minor details of our stay ,thank to all bodrum Team . Wonderful stay in perfect hotel . Rooms fantastic , nice decorations very clean Exellent quality
data.title: BODRUM STAY

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Chekibjouini, 

Warm greetings from Divan Bodrum Hotel. Many thanks for your comments regarding the services and staff during your visit. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much and rest assured that your comments will be shared with the whole team here and read with pride. We are honored that you chose Divan Bodrum Hotel and we look forward to welcoming you again. 

Yours sincerely,

Hotel Manager,

Hasan Uzunhasan
owner_response.author: Eray Yönden

data.text:
It was a nice evening experience.
   Bugra from the service gave very good service.  His stance made us happy.  For a good meal you have to be happily experienced.  Especially okra and eggplant appetizers are not just good appetizers, they serve as a tapas.  Lamb in main course is very successful.
   The chef's coming to the table and explaining the dishes adds a different experience.  Divan brand was in front of us again with a successful team.  I would also like to thank Adnan Chief.
data.title: Amazing nights

data.text:
We reserved with haif board for family room, through Setur.

The aşk extra money for family room in hotel. We learnd that THERE IS NO HALF BOARD in Hotel. They asked money for Dinner

Chose an other ; any hotel will be better then this keep your money in your pocket.
data.title: Why you should not go Divan Bodrum

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 430cenka,

Thank you for choosing our hotel. We apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. Your feedback about the meal plan and charges has been noted. We will address this internally to enhance our services. We value your satisfaction and hope to welcome you back for a better experience.

Best regards,
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Eray Yönden

data.text: The hotel is roughly 40 min from the airport—but well worth the trip.  You do not want to be in the high traffic, crowded city scene. The hotel is in an isolated area filled with palm trees, beautiful gardens and an amazing beach front, which also has a wide deck filled w  beach chairs. Service was impeccable—Turkish version of the Four Seasons standard of service.  All staff were friendly, addressed me by my name, and were available whenever they were needed.  Food was simply perfect—even met the chef at dinner time, whom after chatting about Turkish  cuisine,  went to kitchen to create an entree not in the menu.  Gym was decent, great tennis/pickle ball court.  Beach was outstanding. Overall, loved the hotel—for sure a winner and I will visit again and again.  This is my go-to hotel for Bodrum.
data.title: Paradise

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rokrok7,
We would like to extend our thanks to your kind self for sparing your valuable time to give us your feedback. We are so glad to see that as Divan Bodrum Hotel Team we fulfilled your expectations and made your stay pleasant. These feedbacks encourage us and make us believe what we do! We wish your loyalty to our brand stays for many years and we definitely look forward to welcoming you back to  in the nearest future. 
Yours sincerely,

Hotel General Manager

Hasan Uzunhasan
owner_response.author: Eray Yönden
